mapper.select: select * from klinedot t1, (select type, max(kDotNo) from klinedot where stockCode = #{stockCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by type ) t2 where t1.stockCode = #{stockCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t1.type=t2.type and t1.kDotNo = t2.kDotNo order by t1.type
mapper.update: update klinedot set startprice = #{startPrice}, endprice = #{endPrice, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, amt = #{amt, jdbcType=INTEGER}, ema12 = #{ema12, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ema26 = #{ema26, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, dif = #{dif, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, dea = #{dea, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, macd = #{macd, jdbcType=DOUBLE} where stockCode = #{stockCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and tradeDate = #{tradeDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and tradeTime = #{tradeTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and type = #{type, jdbcType=INTEGER}
